title: 12 Pack Cheesecloth Table Runner, 10ft Rustic Sheer Runner Gauze Tablecloth Boho Wedding Decor Romantic Table Runner for Wedding Bridal Shower Birthday Party(35" x 118") (Terracotta)
descriptions:
Elevate every tablescape with effortless boho charm. Our 12 Pack Cheesecloth Table Runner set in warm Terracotta brings a romantic, rustic touch to weddings, bridal showers, birthday parties, and beyond. Each gauzy runner measures a generous 35" x 118" (10 ft), offering beautiful drape and versatile styling for sweetheart tables, farm tables, head tables, dessert displays, or layered centerpieces.

Why you’ll love it:
- Soft, airy texture: Made from high-quality polyester that feels gentle to the touch yet holds up beautifully through events.
- Effortlessly elegant: Sheer, crinkled gauze creates that coveted boho-chic look—perfect for modern, rustic, or vintage themes.
- Made to last: Durable, lightweight, and skin-friendly fabric that resists wear and tearing.
- One size fits most: The 35" width and 10 ft length provide flexible coverage for a wide range of table sizes and styling ideas.
- Multipurpose magic: Use as table runners, chair sashes, decorative napkins, or even gift wrapping for a coordinated, designer feel across your event.
- Event-ready value: 12 matching runners make it easy to style multiple tables with cohesive color and texture.
- Easy care and reusable: Hand or machine wash on gentle with cold water and mild detergent. Do not iron. Folds compactly for simple storage and transport.

Perfect for:
- Weddings and bridal showers
- Holiday gatherings and birthday parties
- Restaurants, hotels, and styled photoshoots
- Layered centerpieces, arches, backdrops, and more

Create a warm, inviting ambiance with the timeless beauty of terracotta. Dress your tables once—and wow your guests all night. If you have any questions, we’re here to help.
